mutants.mutated_line: new_word = ''.join([n.upper() if o.isupper() else n.lower() for (o, n) in zip(word, new)])

mutants.original_line: new_word = ''.join([n.upper() if o.isupper() else n.lower() for o, n in zip(word, new)])
mutants.mutated_line: new_word = 'MUTATED'.join([n.upper() if o.isupper() else n.lower() for (o, n) in zip(word, new)])
